docs.snippet: A single rate standard on northbound steamship services from Brazilian ports and a partial elimination of similar tariffs on south  bound cargo from Atlantic ports to Brazil and the River Plate were announced last night by George Foley, chairman cf...
docs.lead_paragraph: A single rate standard on northbound steamship services from Brazilian ports and a partial elimination of similar tariffs on south bound cargo from Atlantic ports to Brazil and the River Plate were announced last night by George Foley, chairman cf the conferences covering the trade.

headline.main: SINGLE RATE IS SET ON BRAZIL SHIPPING; Foley Discloses One Standard on Trips North and Cut in Rate to Brazil and Plate ACTION IS A COMPROMISE Lines Seeking to Eliminate Double Rate System Deem It an Important Victory

docs.snippet: BELGIUM'S postal officials have released advance illustrations of the eight designs in the annual charity series  being issued this month.
docs.lead_paragraph: BELGIUM'S postal officials have released advance illustrations of the eight designs in the annual charity series being issued this month.

headline.main: NEW ISSUES FROM AFAR; Belgian Designs Show Noted Belfries-- Albanian Item--Queen's Portrait

docs.snippet: A storm was beating last week against the Trade Agreements Act of 1934. Republicans and Democrats joined in criticizing the law, which expires next June 12. The Administration struck back.
docs.lead_paragraph: A storm was beating last week against the Trade Agreements Act of 1934. Republicans and Democrats joined in criticizing the law, which expires next June 12. The Administration struck back.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 3 (UP)--The South American press today made a concerted attack on Russia for her invasion of Finland.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Dec. 3 (UP)--The South American press today made a concerted attack on Russia for her invasion of Finland.
docs.abstract: Min A Guani reptd seeking joint declaration against USSR invasion of Finland

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICANS CONDEMN RUSSIANS; Newspaper in Buenos Aires Calls Soviet Emissaries to Others 'Dangerous' COLOMBIA ALSO AROUSED President's Message to Finns Brings the Support of All Political Factions

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Dec. 4 (AP)--Forcing the issue with the backing of other South American countries, Argentina today demanded immediate expulsion of Soviet Russia from the League of Nations for her aggression against Finland.
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Dec. 4 (AP)--Forcing the issue with the backing of other South American countries, Argentina today demanded immediate expulsion of Soviet Russia from the League of Nations for her aggression against Finland.
docs.abstract: silent on Min Guani's suggestion that Amer nations make joint declaration against USSR policy

headline.main: OUSTING OF RUSSIA URGED ON LEAGUE; Argentina and Uruguay Call for Punishment Because of Invasion of Finland OTHER STATES BACK MOVE Montevideo Asks the American Countries to Quit Geneva if Soviet Remains Argentina and Uruguay Act Joint Demand Is Urged Brazil Backs Protests Assembly Meets Monday
